====Readings====

|goon=[[どう]] (dō), from [[だう]] (dau) {{qualifier|non-[[w:Jōyō kanji|Jōyō]] reading}}

|kun=[[いね]] (ine), [[いな]] (ina)}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|いね|yomi=k}}
Possibly from {{m|ja|稲|tr=shine}}. See Etymology 2 for more details.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|いね|acc=1|acc_ref=SMK2,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いね|kyu=稻}}

# [[rice]] {{gloss|plant}}

===Etymology 2===
Often found in compounds. The initial s- either represents [[w:epenthesis|epenthesis]] or, more likely, is a reflex of an older form of the word {{m|ja|稲|tr=ine||rice}} maintained in fossilized compounds. See also {{m|ja|春雨|tr=harusame||spring rain}} and {{m|ja|小雨|tr=kosame||light rain}}.

====Noun====

# [[rice]]
